nodes.excerpt: https://cv.me is simple.. For Job Applicants. - Create your online CV and share a link with anyone. - Apply to jobs with a 'single click'. For HR / Recruiters. - Post Jobs. - Applicant Tracking System to track candidates. - Invite colleagues to track jobs.

nodes.excerpt: Datrics helps FinTech companies build and deploy machine learning models without writing code. Analysts and domain experts leverage a drag-n-drop interface to enable self-service analytics.
nodes.title: Datrics - Create a better credit-risk model in days without coding

nodes.excerpt: Free Mac Plugin for cancelling noises in your Zoom/Teams/Slack meetings. Built with privacy in mind - all the data processing is done locally without leaving your device.

nodes.excerpt: https://facet.ai is building the future of AI-assistive creative work. Our mission is to empower professional creatives and teams to collaborate seamlessly on art direction and spend less time pushing pixels.
nodes.title: Facet - Content-aware image editing in your browser.

nodes.excerpt: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
nodes.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals

nodes.excerpt: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.
nodes.title: Blind Pulse - Workplace culture & sentiment ratings by verified employees

nodes.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
nodes.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace

nodes.excerpt: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
nodes.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income

nodes.excerpt: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.
nodes.title: Lizard - Online card game for up to 6 players
nodes.author: Murat Kemaldar

nodes.excerpt: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
nodes.title: ABBYY FineScanner AI 8 - Smart scanner app to make your remote work easy

nodes.excerpt: Now sales, marketing, and finance operators can crush KPIs with machine learning. Our easy-to-use, powerful, and affordable ML platform guides you from data to live predictions in 5 minutes. No code or data science expertise needed.
